comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of beaker 1 used
- y: number of beaker 2 used

Extracted Constraints:
- 4x + 6y \leq 150 (Flour constraint)
- 6x + 3y \leq 100 (Special Liquid constraint)
- 4x + 2y \leq 30 (Waste constraint)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for beaker 1)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for beaker 2)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 5x + 3y (amount of slime produced)
